audio_getid_added_top_text: was added to the top of the queue!
audio_playsong_now_playing_text2: is going to be played now!
bot_stay: :no_entry: The bot has to stay in his channel!
donate_text:
Groovy is growing fast - very fast. We need a huge amount of power to handle requests, but this is expensive. Now we need your help to keep this bot alive!
Here you can donate for the bot: http://patreon.com/rxsto - You'll get special rewards and support the bot enormous! Thank you for even typing this command!
first_join:
Thank you for adding me! :heart:
:white_small_square: My prefix is `g!`
:white_small_square: Type `g!help` for a list of all commands
:white_small_square: Customize me by typing in `g!settings`
:white_small_square: Check out my own server if you need help: https://groovybot.xyz/support/ 
Get started and listen to some good music! :white_check_mark:
help_text: :white_check_mark: Click [here](https://groovybot.xyz/commands/) for a complete view over all features and commands!
info_text: Hey, I'm Groovy. I am a feature-rich music bot for Discord. My main-function is to play specific songs available on YouTube via high quality streaming. All features you can find on my website: https://groovybot.xyz/. Also check out my server: https://groovybot.xyz/support/
invalid_seek_position: :no_entry: The form of your position you want to seek to was invalid!
invite_text:
‚ñ´Ô∏è Invite Groovy to your server: https://groovybot.xyz/invite/
‚ñ´Ô∏è Join Groovy's server: https://groovybot.xyz/support/
is_same_vc: :no_entry: The bot is already in your voicechannel!
is_working: :no_entry: A request is currently being processed. Please slow down...
leave_no_channel: :no_entry: The bot is not inside a voicechannel!
leavecleanup_text: :white_check_mark: Successfully removed all songs from absent users!
low_patron: :no_entry: We thank you very much for donating, but this feature is only available with a higher donation! Check [Patreon](https://patreon.com/rxsto)!
mentioned1: Hey, I'm Groovy, in case you want to know, what my features are, type `
mentioned2: help`. Some information about me, you'll get with `
mentioned3: info`. If you need help or found a bug, feel free to join my server: https://groovybot.xyz/support/
no_channel: :no_entry: You have to be inside a voicechannel!
no_dj: :no_entry: You need the DJ-Role to use this command! The DJ-Role on this server is
no_manage_permissions: :no_entry: You don't have the permission to manage that! You need the `MANAGE_GUILD`-Permission!
no_patron1: :no_entry: You are not registered to be patron! If you are a patron, please make sure to report this on the official Groovy Discord server: http://groovybot.xyz/support/ - If you want to test Patrons-only features, vote up Groovy [here](https://discordbots.org/bot/402116404301660181/vote) and check with `
no_perms_connect: :no_entry: I don't have the permission to join this channel!
no_perms_speak: :no_entry: I don't have the permission to speak in this channel!
not_available: :warning: This feature is currently not available!
not_server: :no_entry: You are not registered to be member on the official Groovy Discord server! If you are a patron, make sure to join: http://groovybot.xyz/support/
not_whole_playlist: :warning: It was not added the whole playlist, because it is longer than you are permitted to! If you want to be able to add longer playlists you should consider [donating](https://patreon.com/rxsto) -  it would help us a lot!
partner_text:
We are partnered with another feature-rich Discord Bot, Rubicon. He's got more than 80 full-functional commands! 

:white_small_square: Invite Rubicon: https://groovybot.xyz/partner/Rubicon/invite/ 
:white_small_square: Rubicon's server: https://groovybot.xyz/partner/Rubicon/support/
prefix_error: :no_entry: The prefix you want to have is longer than 10 characters!
queue_length_error: :no_entry: The length you want to have is bigger/shorter than allowed! Please use less/more than 50/0!
queue_nothing: :no_entry: There is nothing inside the queue!
queue_nothing_site: :no_entry: There are no songs on this queue-site!
queue_to_long: :no_entry: You can not add this song to the queue, because it reached the maximum length!
removed_first_number: :no_entry: You can not remove the current song!
removed_no_args: :no_entry: You need to add a position to remove!
removed_no_number: :no_entry: You need to add a number!
removed_no_song: :no_entry: There is no song on this position!
removed_successfully: :ballot_box_with_check: Successfully removed the song on position
removed_two_args: :no_entry: You only can remove one song per command!
removedupes_text: :white_check_mark: Successfully removed all duplicates from the queue!
reset_guild: :warning: Warning! By typing in `RESET GUILD` you are going to reset the whole guild, so each setting and the whole queue will be reset!
reset_text: :white_check_mark: Successfully reset the process of the current song!
role_error: :no_entry: The name you want to have for the DJ-Role is longer than 30 characters!
same_channel: :no_entry: You have to be in the same channel as the bot!
settings_announce_success: :white_check_mark: The bot is going to announce songs:
settings_dj_mode_success: :white_check_mark: The DJ-Mode was successfully set to:
settings_help_internal_text: You can change the settings by selecting the reaction with the same emoji as the setting you want to change. Afterwards just type in the new setting!
settings_mode_change: :warning: To change the mode insert `true` or `false`!
settings_mode_success: :white_check_mark: The dj-mode was successfully set to:
settings_prefix_change: :warning: To change the prefix insert a new one!
settings_prefix_success: :white_check_mark: The prefix was successfully set to:
settings_queue_change: :warning: To change the queue-length insert a new one!
settings_queue_length_success: :white_check_mark: The queue-length was successfully set to:
settings_role_change: :warning: To change the DJ-Role insert a new one!
settings_role_success: :white_check_mark: The name for the DJ-Role was successfully set to:
settings_role_to_long: :no_entry: The wanted DJ-Role is to long! Please use less than 25 characters!
settings_volume_change: :warning: To change the default-volume insert a new one!
settings_volume_length_success: :white_check_mark: The default-volume was successfully set to
settings_volume_success: :white_check_mark: The bots default volume was successfully set to:
skip_no_song: :no_entry: There is no track you can skip to!
skip_shorter: :no_entry: The queue is shorter than the position you want to skip to!
skip_vote_already: :no_entry: You already voted for a skip!
skip_vote_text: :mega: Somebody voted for a skip! Current votes:
sponsor_text:
We are proudly sponsored by these hosters - Check them out, that would help us:

:white_small_square: [Zap-Hosting - Game- / vServer-Hoster](https://zap-hosting.com/groovybot)
support_text: In case you want to report a bug or need support for the bot, please join Groovy's server: https://groovybot.xyz/support/
update_text: :warning: The bot is going to update now! Please be patient!
volume_args: :no_entry: You need to give an/only one argument
volume_length_error: :no_entry: The wanted default-volume is shorter/bigger than allowed! Use 1-100!
vote_already: :no_entry: You have already voted and got listed! Enjoy your temporary features!
vote_end: :warning: Your temporary features got disabled! Vote up in 23 hours again to get them back! If you want to be able to use Patrons-only features 24/7, you should consider donating! (https://patreon.com/rxsto) - Thank you for your support!
vote_not_member: :no_entry: You need to be member of Groovy's guild to get listed! Join here: [Groovy's Discord](https://groovybot.xyz/support/)
vote_success_text: :white_check_mark: You got successfully added to the list! Enjoy your temporary features!
vote_text: :arrow_up: By upvoting the bot, you are going to get access to Patrons-only features for two hours! You need to upvote [here](https://discordbots.org/bot/402116404301660181/vote) and wait for the success-message! Then you got listed! If you want to be able to use Patrons-only features 24/7, you should consider [donating!](https://patreon.com/rxsto) - Thank you for your support!
vote_wait: :no_entry: You got access to Patrons-only features today already! Vote up again in 23h to get them back! If you want to be able to use Patrons-only features 24/7, you should consider donating! (https://patreon.com/rxsto) - Thank you for your support!
wait_for_skip: :warning: The system is not ready yet! Please wait for 5 seconds, until the song will skip!
